bayesRCM 0.1.0
  • Reference

A Bayesian Heirarchical Random Covariance Model (RCM) for Multi-subject Task-based fMRI Analysis

bayesRCM-package.Rd

An efficient heirarchical graphical modeling package for robust Bayesian RCM sampling, diagnostics, inference, and visualization.
